title: Belmont
name: Belmont
description:
A Map by Brian

It would be cool if every neighborhood/street had a platial map and people would add spots they like and spots where they live and spots where cool or uncool things happened to them.  I am claiming Belmont as my neighborhood.

properties.name: Belmont Computers
properties.description: Posted by Paiges 2535 Se Belmont St. Pdx Or 97214I love these guys, they fix macs too by the way. phone: 503 236 5364 (From Website) Belmont Computers is a locally owned and operated computer store located at the corner of 26th and Belmont St in the heart of Southeast Portland. Since opening in April of 2000, our goal has been to provide the highest quality service and support to our customers, and so far, so good. We do PC repair, Mac repair, custom computer builds, hardware/accessory sales, upgrades, used/refurbished sales, and just about anything that is the least bit geek.

properties.name: Cricket Cafe

properties.name: KHUN Pic's BAHN Thai
properties.description: Posted by Jake 3429 Southeast Belmont Street, Portland, OR, 97214I\'m going to eat here tonight, supposed to be pretty good. Update: This was super good! Order the spring rolls, they have apple in them and come with warm peanut sauce. A little spendy on the price side though, about 2. Ouch. 503-235-1610

properties.name: La Calaca Comelona
properties.description: Posted by Alyss052304 Se Belmont St, Portland, ORAuthentic mexican food - no burritos found here. Lots of funky art and pretty decent food. Do try the spicy drink on the menu and don\'t get that weird sausage hash thing. I stopped here for tequila once with a large New Yorker and had a good ole time.

properties.description: Posted by Brian  3701 SE Belmont, portland, orCoffee shop with comfortable living room quality. Couches, wifi, and lots of outlets for your laptop. I go here to check my email and get a bagel in the morning.

properties.description: Posted by Brian 3433 se belmont, portland, orI live here. My studio is cheap as hell, but I only have a bath. No shower. It\'s above the Paradox and the Avalon. Perfect location, perfect price.

properties.name: The Tao of Tea (Belmont store)
properties.description: Posted by Pylonian   3430 Southeast Belmont Street, Portland, OR, 97214This is one of the places Amanda works and one of my favorite places to study. Beautiful people, beautiful place, beautiful food - I\'d recommend it to anyone for just about anything.

properties.name: Zupans on Belmont
properties.description: Posted by Paiges 3301 SE Belmont Portland OrZupans is a Portland Gourmet Chain Grocery. 503-239-3720 Open 6am - Midnight This was the first place I worked when I moved to Portland. I scooped expensive potato salad into little plastic containers for wealthy people. The prices are higher here than at ordinary grocery stores. But they treat their employees fairly and there is very little employee turn-over. Everyone is super friendly and the flowers are easy to steal. Go here for cheap quality wines, 2 dollar gourmet pb&j\'s, fancy desserts and quality meats and fish.
